content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34277, position -18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34280, position -12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34283, position -9.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34288, position -10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34289, position -6.5, 23.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Electricity network
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric poles at positions (-16.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 19.5), and (-19.5, 22.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the direction argument is correctly specified when placing a pipe. Avoid using multiple values for the same argument.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
